Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Immigration

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Immigration
Oversight - Resources for Immigrant Youth Who Arrived to the United States as Unaccompanied Children.
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Resources for Immigrant Youth Who Arrived to the United States as Unaccompanied Children.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to introduce and pass, and the Governor to sign, legislation amending the tax law to authorize the City of New York to offer a tax credit for businesses to incentivize the creation of workforce development and training programs for newly arrived immigrants.
Items.MatterName: Amending the tax law to authorize the City of New York to offer a tax credit for businesses to incentivize the creation of workforce development and training programs for newly arrived immigrants.
